title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.34 - Operation of aircraft radio or electrical equipment prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.34 - Operation of aircraft radio or electrical equipment prohibited

State Regulations

During fuel handling in connection with any aircraft, no person shall operate any radio transmitter or receiver in such aircraft, or
switch electrical appliances on or off in such aircraft, nor shall any person
do any act or use any material which is likely to cause a spark within 50 feet
of such aircraft. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
